category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ArchitectureModeler_design_solutions_require_NVEs
preference.preference_description: Indicates the number of Authorizing Named Variant Expressions the user needs to select to be able to Add/Replace design solutions. 0 - Allow Add/Replace even if no Authorizing NVE is selected. 1 - Allow Add/Replace if only one Authorizing NVE is selected. Any other value (other than 0 and 1) - Allow Add/Replace if atleast one Authorizing NVE is selected.
